data.lyric:

[00:00.00]The Last Backyard... (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:09.54]It's on fool
[00:11.77]I ain't lettin' 'em talk how they wanna
[00:13.54]Kill 'em they try to play me
[00:15.03]Hustlin' got plenty paper
[00:16.38]Try to take it I'm gon' knock some off
[00:18.51]Smokin' on paper keepin' my mind on murder
[00:20.98]F**k dissin' we tryna catch the b***h in person
[00:23.31]That's when it goes down
[00:24.05]Ain't no pick and choose
[00:24.93]Nah
[00:25.18]We don't ever lose
[00:26.12]We known to break the rules
[00:27.12]Ah
[00:27.17]Put that stick on dude
[00:28.05]Now them n***as screamin' they gon' stretch me too
[00:30.16]Blow his mind soon as that b***h go boom
[00:31.62]Like design we don't leave no clues
[00:32.83]You want my name I want your head
[00:34.10]So what the f**k you wanna do
[00:36.13]Ooh
[00:38.05]I'm puttin' 'em straight on the news
[00:40.85]Them choppers screamin' like ooh
[00:43.94]I'm puttin' 'em straight on the news
[00:47.05]They gon' say they got the police tryna stop him
[00:49.65]He run his mouth 'bout Top 'nem
[00:50.98]Got the drop and them we popped him
[00:52.49]Should be glad that your not him
[00:53.91]In my Rolls Royce ridin' with no tint
[00:55.51]Got them sticks on us like tree limbs
[00:56.99]Big Glocks big knots they know him
[00:58.24]We be ridin' around on big rims
[01:00.02]We schemin' tryna zip him and all the rest
[01:03.08]Shawty hangin' 'round a b***h 'nem we gon' put 'em all to rest
[01:05.98]The ones that follow chicks I'm really ballin'
[01:08.84]What I got buy all again Backyardigans
[01:12.29]Ooh
[01:14.14]I'm puttin' 'em straight on the news
[01:17.09]Them choppers screamin' like ooh
[01:19.93]I'm puttin' 'em straight on the news
[01:24.16]Drivin' fast can't get a pass you crash n***a
[01:26.27]Skrrt skrrt skrrt
[01:26.66]Cross the line we gon' bust his a*s
[01:27.68]We gon' do 'em bad leave 'em smashed n***a
[01:28.77]Boom boom bah
[01:29.54]Ridin' around with these chains on got my pockets filled with that bag n***a
[01:32.08]F**k all these h*es then I send them home and I finish flexin' while you're mad n***a
[01:34.92]Mad ha
[01:35.23]When I up release the whole mag n***a
[01:37.44]I'm in here
[01:38.05]Don't buy the h*es at all they tend to slow me down and they won't stop
[01:41.21]Nah
[01:41.23]They mad I don't be tryin' and I'm hot
[01:43.56]And I'm hot
[01:44.04]Buy that Bentley and I buy another car
[01:46.50]Another car
[01:47.02]I have 'em wonderin' how I done got all this money what the f**k
[01:50.06]Got a watch on both my arms when they see me pullin' up
[01:53.08]Got all these youngins with me armed n***a we don't give a f**k
[01:56.06]It go down shoot it up
[01:57.47]We bust and leave a n***a stuck run with the crowd catch up with us
[02:00.53]Ooh
[02:02.29]I'm puttin' 'em straight on the news
[02:05.06]Them choppers screamin' like ooh
[02:07.87]I'm puttin' 'em straight on the news yeah
[02:12.11]Ooh
[02:23.12]They gon' say they got the police tryna stop him
[02:25.64]He run his mouth 'bout Top 'nem
[02:26.96]Got the drop and them we popped him
[02:28.46]Should be glad that your not him
[02:29.92]In my Rolls Royce ridin' with no tint
[02:31.51]Got them sticks on us like tree limbs
[02:33.03]Big Glocks big knots they know him
[02:34.58]We be ridin' around on big rims
data.trans:
[ti:The Last Backyard... (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Top (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:09.54]装傻充愣
[00:11.77]我不会让他们说出心里的想法
[00:13.54]杀个片甲不留 他们想耍我
[00:15.03]埋头苦干 挣到一大笔钱
[00:16.38]试着接受一切 我要干掉一些人
[00:18.51]吞云吐雾 我一心想着杀人
[00:20.98]我不想玩唇枪舌战那一套 我会亲自动手
[00:23.31]事实就是如此
[00:24.05]别无选择
[00:24.93]//
[00:25.18]我们从来没有失败过
[00:26.12]众所周知 我们喜欢打破成规
[00:27.12]//
[00:27.17]把枪口瞄准敌人
[00:28.05]现在他们大声呐喊  他们也想干掉我
[00:30.16]胆敢轻举妄动 我就朝他头上来一枪
[00:31.62]胸有成竹 我们不会留下蛛丝马迹
[00:32.83]你想知道我的名字 我想要你的项上人头
[00:34.10]所以你究竟想干什么
[00:36.13]//
[00:38.05]我让他们登上新闻头条
[00:40.85]他们扣下扳机
[00:43.94]我让他们登上新闻头条
[00:47.05]他们说他们找警察来阻止他
[00:49.65]他胡说八道 散布谣言
[00:50.98]倾泻火力 我们干掉他
[00:52.49]你该庆幸你不是他
[00:53.91]我开着劳斯莱斯 车窗没有贴黑色的膜
[00:55.51]随身带着武器 就像是树枝
[00:56.99]格洛克枪 大把钞票 他们认识他
[00:58.24]我们开着车子狂飙
[01:00.02]我么暗中谋划 想要把他和剩下的人全部干掉
[01:03.08]妹子到处徘徊 我们让他们一命呜呼
[01:05.98]与妹子形影不离 我赚了很多钱
[01:08.84]我把我需要的东西再买了一遍 身边跟着兄弟
[01:12.29]//
[01:14.14]我让他们登上新闻头条
[01:17.09]他们扣下扳机
[01:19.93]我让他们登上新闻头条
[01:24.16]一路狂飙 你无处可逃
[01:26.27]//
[01:26.66]肆无忌惮 我们干掉他
[01:27.68]我们教训他们一顿 把他们打得落花流水
[01:28.77]//
[01:29.54]戴着金链子招摇过市 我的口袋里塞满钞票
[01:32.08]对这些妹子置之不理 我送她们回家 我尽情炫耀 你怒火中烧
[01:34.92]怒火中烧
[01:35.23]当我现身 我倾泻火力 哥们
[01:37.44]我在这里
[01:38.05]别相信这些女人 她们想让我放慢脚步 绝不会收手
[01:41.21]//
[01:41.23]他们嫉妒我轻而易举就成功 我风头正盛
[01:43.56]我风头正盛
[01:44.04]买下宾利 我还买了另一辆车
[01:46.50]另一辆车
[01:47.02]我让他们好奇我是怎么赚到这些钱的 怎么了
[01:50.06]当他们看见我露面时 我的两只手腕分别戴着一只表
[01:53.08]我身边跟着全副武装的小兄弟 哥们 我们不屑一顾
[01:56.06]大杀四方
[01:57.47]我们围追堵截 跟着大家一起行动 追上我们
[02:00.53]//
[02:02.29]我让他们登上新闻头条
[02:05.06]他们扣下扳机
[02:07.87]我让他们登上新闻头条
[02:12.11]//
[02:23.12]他们说他们找警察来阻止他
[02:25.64]他胡说八道 散布谣言
[02:26.96]倾泻火力 我们干掉他
[02:28.46]你该庆幸你不是他
[02:29.92]我开着劳斯莱斯 车窗没有贴黑色的膜
[02:31.51]随身带着武器 就像是树枝
[02:33.03]格洛克枪 大把钞票 他们认识他
[02:34.58]我们开着车子狂飙
